Chemist in state drug lab scandal in police custody

Ex-state chemist Annie Dookhan (left) is set to be arraigned later today in Boston on charges of witness intimidation and falsifying her academic record, law enforcement officials said. (Globe, 11:41 a.m.)

Apple CEO apologizes for iOS maps

Tim Cook said he was "extremely sorry" in an open letter today for the much maligned new maps that are part of its recently launched operating system. (Globe, 9:16 a.m.)
